title: e-commerce data scraping website(full package)
snippet:
Looking for an experienced back end and front end developer for 3-4 weeks project. You would need to build a price comparison website. It would take data automatically from different e-commerce websites using some kind of data scraping algorithms and make a price comparison between different products. We would like to focus on price comparison for electronics, airplane tickets, bank services, insurance services and cellular provider plans.  We require solid backend and front end for the website + SEO + mobile friendly interface + support.
Find attached an initial specifications and message me if interested.
